screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 10) count = len(self.list) if count > 10: count = 10 offset = 25 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 30 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 30
if (520 > wsizex): wsizex = 520 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = ((wsizex - 40), offset) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(20, (textsize[1] + 15))) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1024-wsizex)/2, (576-wsizey)/(count > 7 and 2 or 3)))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 10), size = (200, 50), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (10, 5), size = (60, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 50 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 60 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (textsize[0], 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(20, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 5), size = (530, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the nim name, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 30), size = (530, 30), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is a description of the nim settings, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 15)], "itemHeight": 70 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 10), size = (200, 50), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (10, 5), size = (60, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 5), size = (580, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 2 is the Menu Titel MultiContentEntryText(pos = (70, 35), size = (570, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 3 is the Description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 3), # index 4 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 15)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (40, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 0), # index 0 is the isMounted pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (150, 5), size = (200, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (320, 8), size = (250, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the IPdescription MultiContentEntryText(pos = (150, 35), size = (350, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the DIRdescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (500, 15), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the activepng pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (530, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 4 is the mounttype pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 17)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 1), # index 1 is the expandable/expanded/verticalline icon MultiContentEntryText(pos = (70, 4), size = (580, 26), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the Hostname MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 5), size = (480, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 35), size = (480, 17), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 4 is the sharedescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (65, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 5 is the nfs/cifs icon MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (110, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 6), # index 6 is the isMounted icon ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 17),gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 7), size = (590, 50), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 3), # index 4 is the status pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 40)], "itemHeight": 60 }
